text:
The Lucene TextContentIndexer class indexes the content of a document twice :
first time it indexes the document raw content and second time it indexes
content coming from a content extractor.
creator: fabrice.dewasmes@openwide.fr

text:
Created attachment 15530
corrective patch

the 'raw content indexing' is commented out as content extractors should do
their work right after.
creator: fabrice.dewasmes@openwide.fr
